summary: No limit to disk space used when caching

comments.content: As of right now osmdroid does not limit the amount of disk space used when caching tiles.   They have an expiry date set of about a month, but will keep  using more and more space on disk.   It might not be a bad idea to limit the amount of cached tiles on disk to 100? or so.
Apologies, I meant to enter this as an enhancement request.

Hey,

This is a small patch to introduce a limit to disk space used when caching tiles. The limit is 600Mb.

Let me know your comments

Thanks
This issue was closed by revision r511.

@Fabien

I've committed your patch with a few changes. If you think the changes I made are wrong, please let me know.
